text: Hulk is a 2003 American monster movie directed by Ang Lee. It was based on the Marvel character Hulk by Stan Lee. Hulk's main actors are Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, and Nick Nolte. == Plot == In the 1960s, David Banner wanted to create super soldiers but General Ross denied him permission. David decided to test on himself. He later had a son named Bruce. == References == Category:2003 movies Category:English-language movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Hulk (Marvel Comics) Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Ang Lee Category:Movies produced by Avi Arad Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Screenplays by James Schamus Category:Superhero drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Hulk (movie)
